basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Betty VanAntwerp Estes Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to any education major within the College of Education & Professional Studies who is also an Oklahoma resident. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate or graduate student within the College of Education and Professional Studies Must be admitted to the Teacher Education Program Must be a sophomore classification or above at the time the scholarship is awarded 3.0 GPA or higher Enrolled full-time Student must have been raised in an Oklahoma town with a High School graduating class of 100 or fewer Essay of 250 words describing the town you were raised in and your plan to teach in this or any other Rural Oklahoma town Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
